00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00035 template <class MutexT>
00036 class Locker : boost::noncopyable {
00037 public:
00038   explicit Locker(MutexT &mutex, bool init_lock = true)
00039     : m_mutex(mutex), m_locked(false) {
00040     if (init_lock) lock();
00041   }
00042   ~Locker() {
00043     if (m_locked) unlock();
00044   }
00045 
00046 private:
00047   MutexT &m_mutex;
00048   bool m_locked;
00049 
00050   void lock() {
00051     HT_ASSERT(!m_locked);
00052     m_mutex.lock();
00053     m_locked = true;
00054   }
00055 
00056   void unlock() {
00057     HT_ASSERT(m_locked);
00058     m_mutex.unlock();
00059     m_locked = false;
00060   }
00061 };
00062 
00063 typedef boost::mutex::scoped_lock ScopedLock;
00064 
00065 class Mutex : public boost::mutex {
00066 public:
00067 #if BOOST_VERSION < 103500
00068   typedef boost::detail::thread::lock_ops<boost::mutex> Ops;
00069 
00070   void lock() { Ops::lock(*this); }
00071 
00072   void unlock() { Ops::unlock(*this); }
00073 #endif
00074 };
00075 
00076 class RecMutex : public boost::recursive_mutex {
00077 public:
00078 #if BOOST_VERSION < 103500
00079   typedef boost::detail::thread::lock_ops<boost::recursive_mutex> Ops;
00080 
00081   void lock() { Ops::lock(*this); }
00082 
00083   void unlock() { Ops::unlock(*this); }
00084 #endif
00085 };
00086 
00087 typedef boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock ScopedRecLock;
